summary: An Iranian couple from the city drive around a remote mountainous region. They hand out bags of money to poor villagers in return for them carrying out unusual requests the couple make of them.
cast: Taraneh Alidoosti|Mani Haghighi|Saeed Changizian|Esmaeel Khalaj|Saber Abar|Mohammad Aghebati|Danial Fathi|Himan Dehgani|Naqi Seif-Jamali|Nader Fallah|Vahid Aghapoor|Ghorban Nadjafi
title: Paziraie sadeh
